meanings.definition: To kiss someone in a more intense or passionate manner than usual.
meanings.sent1: She decided to outkiss him by surprising him with a passionate kiss.
meanings.sent2: They always outkiss each other whenever they meet, showing their love.
meanings.sent3: The romantic movie scene made her want to outkiss her partner playfully.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was so strong that she could outkiss anyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The sunset at the beach inspired them to outkiss under the colorful sky.

meanings.definition: To surpass or outdo in kissing.
meanings.sent1: In the kissing contest, she managed to outkiss all her competitors.
meanings.sent2: He always tries to outkiss his girlfriend to show his affection.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy tried to outkiss its owner, leaving everyone amused.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to outkiss others made her the champion of the kissing game.
meanings.sent5: The young couple's love was so strong that they could outkiss anyone around them.
